welcome.title: Welcome to Table – Habit Tracker
welcome.message: Mark completed days with a left click, excluded — with a right click (or long press on mobile). Leave empty if not done. Use eraser mode (E) to clear marks and delete mode (D) to remove tasks. All data is saved locally. Good luck!

hotkeys.title: Keyboard shortcuts
hotkeys.escape: Escape: Reset modes and close menu/settings
hotkeys.arrowLeft: Arrow left: Switch to previous month
hotkeys.arrowRight: Arrow right: Switch to next month

control.title: Menu
control.duplicateToCurrent: Duplicate all tasks to current month

duplicate.title: Confirm Duplication
duplicate.message: Tasks from the selected month will be copied to the current month (replacing existing ones)
